name: extention-devil-glitches
description: glitches are invading our world, help the guardian to keep it free

scripts.gen: cp src/index.html target/index.html && cp build/build.min.js target/b.js
scripts.build-nominify: npm run clean && npm run compileglsl && npm run concat && npm run nominify && npm run gen
scripts.zip: cd target; zip -r ../target.zip .; cd ..; wc -c target.zip
scripts.build: export NODE_ENV=production; npm run clean && npm run compileglsl && npm run concat && npm run uglify && npm run gen && npm run zip
scripts.watch: npm run build-nominify; wr 'npm run build-nominify' src/ scripts/
scripts.start: npm run watch & npm run liveserver
